short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grammer-examiner powered by ChatGPT and Next.js

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grammar correction through AI for efficient English learning anytime, anywhere! 
After simply setting up the Google AI key, you can select the English text and click the Grammar-Examiner icon to determine if the current grammar is correct. The AI will also provide grammar suggestions.
